Class GBController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • lib.GBController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HomeController, ItemsController, SalesController, UsersController

    public abstract class GBController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    A collection of common methods for use in GarageBuddy controllers
    Author:
    Dean Papastrat
